price: Ele é Quem vos faz descer do céu água. Dela bebeis e dela brota vegetação, em que fazeis pascer vossos rebanhos.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗۖ لَّكُم مِّنۡهُ شَرَابٞ وَمِنۡهُ شَجَرٞ فِيهِ تُسِيمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī anzala mina al-samāi māan lakum min'hu sharābun wamin'hu shajarun fīhi tusīmūna
